dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5361 IH: To require that the Secretary of the Treasury establish a program for the issuance of identity protection personal identification numbers.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Paulsen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To require that the Secretary of the Treasury establish a program for the issuance of identity protection personal identification numbers.

section.text: The Secretary of the Treasury (or the Secretary’s delegate) shall establish a program to issue, upon the request of any individual, a number which may be used in connection with such individual’s Social Security number (or other identifying information with respect to such individual) to assist the Secretary in verifying such individual’s identity.
